document_data.name: ''Waterdeep News''
document_data.mainbody:
'''''Waterdeep News''''' was a newspaper based in [[Waterdeep]] on the [[Sword Coast North]], published daily in the early 1370s [[DR]].

It reported on a variety of current political matters, crimes, social events, gossip and unusual happenings in the city. It was one of the largest daily newspapers in [[Faer√ªn]].<ref>{{Cite web/Waterdeep News}}
